scl10.uk.ac.aber.users.readers

Class ImageReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • scl10.uk.ac.aber.users.readers.ImageReader

  • public final class ImageReader
extends java.lang.Object
    An immutable class for the reading images and parsing the pixel values of image data.
    Author:
    Scott Lockett

      • readImageFile

        public static java.awt.image.BufferedImage readImageFile(@NonNull
                                                         java.io.File imageFile)
        Load an image from a given file. This method is static as it does not feel like it would be an instance specific method and can be used else where in the project for image loading.
        Parameters:
        imageFile - The file of the image to be loaded. cannot be null.
        Returns:
        A buffered image that has been read into the program from the given file.
